content.title: 🔨 Production Underway, Shipping Getting Ready! 🚀
content.creator:
Oukitel Titan
March 13, 2025
content.content:
Hi Titan Backers,
  We’re thrilled to let you know that mass production of the Oukitel WP100 Titan is in progress! 🔨 This means we’re getting closer to shipping your rugged powerhouse to you!
  Once the campaign concludes, we’ll begin shipping orders and making sure that your Titan arrives safely and on time. 🚚 We’re working hard to make sure the delivery is smooth, and we can’t wait for you to experience the Titan.
  Thanks again for your support. Stay tuned for more updates!
  Best regards,
Oukitel Team

comments.text: I'm anxious to have it in my hands, I'm anxious to mesure the real sizes and how I can adapted to use on my motorbike as a device to record video and use as gps guide. Have you in mind any kind of adapter or support to mount in a Selfie bar or Cameras supports? Congratulations

Thank you for your enthusiasm! The phone's dimensions are 178.3 x 84.3 x 35.6 mm. We're currently working on a motorcycle mount, so stay tuned for updates! In the meantime, you can use universal selfie bar holders or bike camera mounts!
Wonderfull!!! I'm anxious to have news about it!!!!
The best mobile innovation since the Sony Ericsson P800, packed with Harvard-level news and resources. Does it deliver? Will I get many people to buy it once I have it?

Love the enthusiasm! The WP100 Titan is packed with innovation, and we believe it delivers rugged durability, extreme battery life, and unique features like the built-in projector. If you share it with others, we’re sure many will be intrigued! The shipping will start as soon as the campaign concludes. We’d love to hear your thoughts once you get it!
I can't wait to start using this phone everywhere I go even on my hardest adventures
That's fantastic! We're so excited for you to try it out and can't wait to hear all about your experiences!
Good News, Very Good News! I can't wait to be able to use my new Oukitel wp100 titan and have it in my hands
We can't thank you enough for the incredible support!

content.title: 🎉 $400K Milestone Achieved – Let’s Keep the Momentum Going! 🚀
content.creator:
Oukitel Titan
February 25, 2025
content.content:
We’ve hit an incredible milestone—$400K in funding! A massive THANK YOU to all our amazing backers for making this possible. 🙏
  But the journey doesn’t end here! Now, it’s time to give back to YOU with our brand-new Referral Program. 📈
  Here’s how it works:
1️⃣ Sign up as a Booster
2️⃣ Share your unique referral link
3️⃣ Earn 5% cashback for each successful referral who pledges through your link
Let’s keep spreading the word, growing the Titan community, and earning rewards for your support! 💥
  Join the movement now and start earning with every successful referral. Your Titan awaits!
Start Sharing & Earning Now! 🚀

content.title: 🎉 We’re 100% Funded in Record Time – Thank You for Your Support! 🚀
content.creator:
Oukitel Titan
February 18, 2025
content.content:
In an incredible show of support, our WP100 Titan project hit 100% funding in just 9 minutes! We’re beyond grateful to each and every one of you who backed us – you’re helping us bring the ultimate rugged phone to life! 🌍
  The excitement doesn’t stop here though! Our 48-hour early bird special is still going strong, so don’t miss out on these amazing perks, including free worldwide shipping and bonus gifts! Time is ticking, grab your Titan now and be part of the adventure! ⏳
  And that’s not all – we’re excited to share 2 brand-new YouTube Reviews showcasing the WP100 Titan in action! Watch the full product review, featuring both indoor and outdoor tests, and get an in-depth look at the amazing features of our rugged Titan phone. 📹
  Check out the full video and get ready to see Titan in action!
👉 Oukitell WP100 Titan - This Is Outrageous!
👉 Oukitel WP100 Titan REVIEW

comments.text: Hi Pawel, please drop a letter at wp100titan@oukitel.com for detailed requests. Thank you!
We greatly appreciate your feedback and suggestions! These are our goals for improvement.
Hi, thank you for the question. Here are the instructions for the purchase. https://www.facebook.com/groups/oukitelwp100titan/posts/1195755848895135
